name: R4B-Appointment-R5-Appointment
title: Concept map to convert a FHIR R4B Appointment into FHIR R5

element.display: A booking of a healthcare event among patient(s), practitioner(s), related person(s) and/or device(s) for a specific date/time. This may result in one or more Encounter(s)

target.display: A booking of a healthcare event among patient(s), practitioner(s), related person(s) and/or device(s) for a specific date/time. This may result in one or more Encounter(s)
target.comment: R4B `Appointment` maps as Equivalent to R5 `Appointment`

element.display: The style of appointment or patient that has been booked in the slot (not service type)

target.display: The style of appointment or patient that has been booked in the slot (not service type)
target.comment: R4B `Appointment.appointmentType` maps as Equivalent to R5 `Appointment.appointmentType`

element.display: The service request this appointment is allocated to assess

target.display: The request this appointment is allocated to assess
target.comment: R4B `Appointment.basedOn` maps as SourceIsNarrowerThanTarget to R5 `Appointment.basedOn` - basedOn has change due to type change: R4B `basedOn` `Reference` maps as SourceIsNarrowerThanTarget for R5 `basedOn`

element.display: The coded reason for the appointment being cancelled
Additional comments
Contained, inline Resources

target.display: Contained, inline Resources
target.comment: R4B `Appointment.contained` maps as Equivalent to R5 `Appointment.contained`

element.display: The date that this appointment was initially created

target.display: The date that this appointment was initially created
target.comment: R4B `Appointment.created` maps as Equivalent to R5 `Appointment.created`

element.display: Shown on a subject line in a meeting request, or appointment list

target.display: Shown on a subject line in a meeting request, or appointment list
target.comment: R4B `Appointment.description` maps as Equivalent to R5 `Appointment.description`

element.display: When appointment is to conclude

target.display: When appointment is to conclude
target.comment: R4B `Appointment.end` maps as Equivalent to R5 `Appointment.end`

element.display: Additional content defined by implementations

target.display: Additional content defined by implementations
target.comment: R4B `Appointment.extension` maps as RelatedTo to R5 `Appointment.extension` - extension has change due to type change: R4B `extension` `Extension` maps as RelatedTo for R5 `extension`

element.display: Logical id of this artifact

target.display: Logical id of this artifact
target.comment: R4B `Appointment.id` maps as Equivalent to R5 `Appointment.id`

element.display: External Ids for this item

target.display: External Ids for this item
target.comment: R4B `Appointment.identifier` maps as Equivalent to R5 `Appointment.identifier`

element.display: A set of rules under which this content was created

target.display: A set of rules under which this content was created
target.comment: R4B `Appointment.implicitRules` maps as Equivalent to R5 `Appointment.implicitRules`

element.display: Language of the resource content

target.display: Language of the resource content
target.comment: R4B `Appointment.language` maps as RelatedTo to R5 `Appointment.language` - language made the binding required (from Preferred) for http://hl7.org/fhir/ValueSet/all-languages|5.0.0

element.display: Metadata about the resource

target.display: Metadata about the resource
target.comment: R4B `Appointment.meta` maps as Equivalent to R5 `Appointment.meta`

element.display: Can be less than start/end (e.g. estimate)

target.display: Can be less than start/end (e.g. estimate)
target.comment: R4B `Appointment.minutesDuration` maps as Equivalent to R5 `Appointment.minutesDuration`

element.display: Extensions that cannot be ignored

target.display: Extensions that cannot be ignored
target.comment: R4B `Appointment.modifierExtension` maps as RelatedTo to R5 `Appointment.modifierExtension` - modifierExtension has change due to type change: R4B `modifierExtension` `Extension` maps as RelatedTo for R5 `modifierExtension`

element.display: Participants involved in appointment

target.display: Participants involved in appointment
target.comment: R4B `Appointment.participant` maps as Equivalent to R5 `Appointment.participant`

element.display: Person, Location/HealthcareService or Device

target.display: The individual, device, location, or service participating in the appointment
target.comment: R4B `Appointment.participant.actor` maps as SourceIsNarrowerThanTarget to R5 `Appointment.participant.actor` - actor has change due to type change: R4B `actor` `Reference` maps as SourceIsNarrowerThanTarget for R5 `actor`

element.display: Additional content defined by implementations

target.display: Additional content defined by implementations
target.comment: R4B `Appointment.participant.extension` maps as RelatedTo to R5 `Appointment.participant.extension` - extension has change due to type change: R4B `extension` `Extension` maps as RelatedTo for R5 `extension`

element.display: Unique id for inter-element referencing

target.display: Unique id for inter-element referencing
target.comment: R4B `Appointment.participant.id` maps as Equivalent to R5 `Appointment.participant.id`

element.display: Extensions that cannot be ignored even if unrecognized

target.display: Extensions that cannot be ignored even if unrecognized
target.comment: R4B `Appointment.participant.modifierExtension` maps as RelatedTo to R5 `Appointment.participant.modifierExtension` - modifierExtension has change due to type change: R4B `modifierExtension` `Extension` maps as RelatedTo for R5 `modifierExtension`

element.display: Participation period of the actor

target.display: Participation period of the actor
target.comment: R4B `Appointment.participant.period` maps as Equivalent to R5 `Appointment.participant.period`

element.display: required | optional | information-only

target.display: The participant is required to attend (optional when false)
target.comment: R4B `Appointment.participant.required` maps as RelatedTo to R5 `Appointment.participant.required` - required removed a binding requirement - Required http://hl7.org/fhir/ValueSet/participantrequired|4.3.0; required has change due to type change: R4B required code has no equivalent or mapped type in R5 required

element.display: accepted | declined | tentative | needs-action

target.display: accepted | declined | tentative | needs-action
target.comment: R4B `Appointment.participant.status` maps as Equivalent to R5 `Appointment.participant.status` - status has compatible required binding for code type: http://hl7.org/fhir/ValueSet/participationstatus|4.3.0 and http://hl7.org/fhir/ValueSet/participationstatus|5.0.0 (Equivalent)

element.display: Role of participant in the appointment

target.display: Role of participant in the appointment
target.comment: R4B `Appointment.participant.type` maps as Equivalent to R5 `Appointment.participant.type`

element.display: Detailed information and instructions for the patient

target.display: Detailed information and instructions for the patient
target.comment: R4B `Appointment.patientInstruction` maps as RelatedTo to R5 `Appointment.patientInstruction` - patientInstruction changed from scalar to array (max cardinality from 1 to *); patientInstruction has change due to type change: R4B patientInstruction string has no equivalent or mapped type in R5 patientInstruction

element.display: Used to make informed decisions if needing to re-prioritize

target.display: Used to make informed decisions if needing to re-prioritize
target.comment: R4B `Appointment.priority` maps as RelatedTo to R5 `Appointment.priority` - priority added a binding requirement - Example http://terminology.hl7.org/ValueSet/v3-ActPriority; priority has change due to type change: R4B priority unsignedInt has no equivalent or mapped type in R5 priority

element.display: Coded reason this appointment is scheduled
Reason the appointment is to take place (resource)
Potential date/time interval(s) requested to allocate the appointment within

target.display: Potential date/time interval(s) requested to allocate the appointment within
target.comment: R4B `Appointment.requestedPeriod` maps as Equivalent to R5 `Appointment.requestedPeriod`

element.display: A broad categorization of the service that is to be performed during this appointment

target.display: A broad categorization of the service that is to be performed during this appointment
target.comment: R4B `Appointment.serviceCategory` maps as Equivalent to R5 `Appointment.serviceCategory`

element.display: The specific service that is to be performed during this appointment

target.display: The specific service that is to be performed during this appointment
target.comment: R4B `Appointment.serviceType` maps as SourceIsBroaderThanTarget to R5 `Appointment.serviceType` - serviceType has change due to type change: R4B serviceType CodeableConcept has no equivalent or mapped type in R5 serviceType

element.display: The slots that this appointment is filling

target.display: The slots that this appointment is filling
target.comment: R4B `Appointment.slot` maps as Equivalent to R5 `Appointment.slot`

element.display: The specialty of a practitioner that would be required to perform the service requested in this appointment

target.display: The specialty of a practitioner that would be required to perform the service requested in this appointment
target.comment: R4B `Appointment.specialty` maps as Equivalent to R5 `Appointment.specialty`

element.display: When appointment is to take place

target.display: When appointment is to take place
target.comment: R4B `Appointment.start` maps as Equivalent to R5 `Appointment.start`

element.display: proposed | pending | booked | arrived | fulfilled | cancelled | noshow | entered-in-error | checked-in | waitlist

target.display: proposed | pending | booked | arrived | fulfilled | cancelled | noshow | entered-in-error | checked-in | waitlist
target.comment: R4B `Appointment.status` maps as Equivalent to R5 `Appointment.status` - status has compatible required binding for code type: http://hl7.org/fhir/ValueSet/appointmentstatus|4.3.0 and http://hl7.org/fhir/ValueSet/appointmentstatus|5.0.0 (Equivalent)

element.display: Additional information to support the appointment

target.display: Additional information to support the appointment
target.comment: R4B `Appointment.supportingInformation` maps as Equivalent to R5 `Appointment.supportingInformation`

element.display: Text summary of the resource, for human interpretation

target.display: Text summary of the resource, for human interpretation
target.comment: R4B `Appointment.text` maps as Equivalent to R5 `Appointment.text`
